fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: A single line of smoke forming into the shape of a snake for when there is a fireworks ban.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Fire crackers on a stick.  Use them for a fun game of chicken with friends!

tnt.name: TNT
tnt.description: For blowing a big hole in anything you want to destroy.

land mine.name: Land Mine
land mine.description: For blowing a hole in a specifi direction on the ground.

toilet seat.name: Leaving the Toilet Seat Up
toilet seat.description: Classic argument for any co-habitating couple.

dirty dishes.name: Dirty dishes in the sink
dirty dishes.description: The age old passive aggressive argument...who will crack first?
